## High-Yield Oncology CRA Checklist

### Monitoring
- [ ] Cycle 1 SDV complete
- [ ] RECIST assessments verified
- [ ] Dose changes documented
- [ ] Imaging windows met

### Safety
- [ ] irAEs tracked
- [ ] Hospitalizations documented
- [ ] Follow-up complete

### Regulatory
- [ ] Amendments approved
- [ ] Re-consent completed
- [ ] Central lab manuals current
